content:
Kendrick Lamar's "Humble." is an excellent choice! It's a high-energy track that shares a similar vibe with "My Shot" from Hamilton. I'm thrilled to have been able to help you discover some new music that resonates with you.

Remember, the key to creating a great playlist is to experiment and have fun with it! Don't be afraid to try out new tracks, genres, and artists. You might be surprised at how certain songs can complement each other and create a unique sound.

If you need more recommendations or have any other questions, feel free to ask. I'm always here to help. Otherwise, enjoy your playlist-making journey, and I hope you discover some amazing new music that inspires and energizes you!

Happy playlisting!
